posts.post_text: January 28, 2016 at 7:50 PM#5The only way to make images appear and disappear in a layout is to copy one image to another e.g. copy image x at image y/overwriteThere is no way you can assign images to objects in the layout because objects in a layout are only references to items in the show file, they don't have a dedicated number within the layout and are therefore not directly assignable
